title: My Father is a Hero, My Mother is a Spirit, the Daughter (Me) is a Reincarnator. - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Supernatural
tags: Adapted to Manga   Age Progression   Child Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Doting Parents   Elemental Magic   Familial Love   Family   Famous Parents   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Half-human Protagonist   Helpful Protagonist   Magic   Nobles   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Reincarnated in Another World   Reincarnation   Royalty   Special Abilities   Spirit Users   Spirits
author: Matsuura   松浦
description:
I was a 28-year-old researcher in Japan, and before I knew it, I have been reincarnated in a fantasy world.

Furthermore, I had a half-spirit father and a spirit mother.

An aunt who is deeply attached to father, cousins who are problem children. Girls who cause awkward situations as in an otome.

Furthermore, in order to gain the affection of a love interest, a cousin even had a word battle with a king!

I am very busy helping humans as well as spirits!

And when I find people who are targeting my father,

「I’ll crush you.」

The cheat protagonist deters those who aim at her family. This is such a story.>
